title: The Little King Next Door - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Shounen Ai   Tragedy
tags: Based on a Video Game   Calm Protagonist   Child Protagonist   Childcare   Doting Love Interests   Familial Love   Game Elements   Game Ranking System   Male Yandere   Medical Knowledge   Older Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Revenge   Romantic Subplot   Second Chance   Seme Protagonist   Slow Romance   Strong to Stronger   Transported into a Game World
author: Yi Ren Bei   易人北
description:
Everyone in District 13 knows that Little King Next Door is not the son of Old King Next Door. But they don’t know that Little King Next Door is reborn.

The moment Wang Ye died with all his enemies, he relaxed and thought: Damn it, he’s finally dead, this life is worth it, that’s all.

Who would have thought that he would be reborn in the most f**ked uptime of his life?

This was when the world had just launched a holographic game called “Extreme Danger”.

Wang Ye, who was super poor in his previous life, did not have access to this game until he was nineteen, and by then he was already lagging behind many others. But even so, with his fear of death and tenacity, he made his way in this world, and later even discovered the secrets of this world.

Now he will enter this game eleven years early..>
